sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, Paper, Typography, Box, Grid, Card, CardContent, Button, Avatar, List, ListItem, ListItemText, ListItemIcon, Divider, Alert, CircularProgress, LinearProgress, Chip, Rating, } from '@mui/material'; import { Person, ShoppingCart, Restaurant, Assessment, Favorite, History, LocalOffer, TrendingUp, Star, AccessTime, Logout, Home, Settings, Notifications, Order, } from '@mui/icons-material'; const SimpleUserDashboard = () => { const [userData, setUserData] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(''); // Sample user data const userStats = { totalOrders: 28, totalSpent: 456.78, favoriteItems: 12, points: 1250, memberSince: 'January 2024', lastOrder: '2 days ago', avgOrderValue: 16.31 }; const recentOrders = [ { id: 1234, vendor: 'Burger Palace', items: 'Classic Burger, Fries', total: 18.99, status: 'Delivered', date: '2024-02-10' }, { id: 1233, vendor: 'Pizza Express', items: 'Pepperoni Pizza', total: 15.99, status: 'Delivered', date: '2024-02-08' }, { id: 1232, vendor: 'Green Garden', items: 'Caesar Salad', total: 8.99, status: 'Delivered', date: '2024-02-05' }, { id: 1231, vendor: 'Chicken House', items: 'Grilled Chicken', total: 14.99, status: 'Delivered', date: '2024-02-03' }, ]; const favoriteItems = [ { id: 1, name: 'Classic Burger', vendor: 'Burger Palace', price: 12.99, rating: 4.5 }, { id: 2, name: 'Caesar Salad', vendor: 'Green Garden', price: 8.99, rating: 4.2 }, { id: 3, name: 'Pepperoni Pizza', vendor: 'Pizza Express', price: 15.99, rating: 4.7 }, ]; const recommendations = [ { id: 1, name: 'BBQ Bacon Burger', vendor: 'Burger Palace', price: 14.99, rating: 4.6, reason: 'Based on your favorites' }, { id: 2, name: 'Greek Salad', vendor: 'Green Garden', price: 9.99, rating: 4.3, reason: 'Popular in your area' }, { id: 3, name: 'Margherita Pizza', vendor: 'Pizza Express', price: 13.99, rating: 4.5, reason: 'Trending now' }, ]; useEffect(() => { // Try to get user data from localStorage, but don't fail if it's not there try { const user = localStorage.getItem('user'); if (user) { const parsedUser = JSON.parse(user); setUserData(parsedUser); } else { // Set default user data if localStorage is empty setUserData({ id: 1, name: 'Test User', email: 'user@test.com', role: 'USER' }); } } catch (err) { // Set default user data on error setUserData({ id: 1, name: 'Test User', email: 'user@test.com', role: 'USER' }); } setLoading(false); }, []); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('user'); window.location.href = '/login'; }; const handleNavigateToMealPlanner = () => { window.location.href = '/meal-planner'; }; const handleViewOrderHistory = () => { alert('Order History feature coming soon!'); }; const handleViewFavorites = () => { alert('Favorites feature coming soon!'); }; const handleViewProfile = () => { alert('Profile settings coming soon!'); }; if (loading) { return ( ); } if (error) { return ( {error} ); } return ( {/* Header */} User Dashboard Welcome back, {userData?.name || 'User'}! Member since {userStats.memberSince} • {userStats.points} points {/* User Stats Cards */} {userStats.totalOrders} Total Orders ${userStats.totalSpent} Total Spent {userStats.favoriteItems} Favorites {userStats.points} Points {/* Quick Actions */} Quick Actions Recent Orders {recentOrders.map((order) => ( Order #{order.id} } secondary={`${order.vendor} • ${order.items} • $${order.total} • ${order.date}`} /> ))} {/* Favorites and Recommendations */} Your Favorites {favoriteItems.map((item) => ( ({item.rating}) ))} Recommended for You {recommendations.map((item) => ( ({item.rating}) ))} {/* Progress Bar for Points */} Rewards Progress {userStats.points} / 2000 points to next reward 🎉 You're {2000 - userStats.points} points away from a free meal! ); }; export default SimpleUserDashboard;
